BehaviorTree.ID: Grasp Pose Griz Tuning to Yaml
BehaviorTree._description: Moves the gripper to the April Tag and then prompts the user to teleop to a grasp pose. Saves the resulting pose to a YAML file.

SubTree.user_interaction_prompt: Teleoperate end effector to grasp pose
